article: Today is Tuesday. We are having a  _  class in the classroom. Ms Chen is telling us what water is like. After that, she asks us "  _  water like?" No one speaks for  a few  minutes. Ms Chen asks again,"Why don't you  _  my question? Don't I tell you what water is like?" A boy names Zhang Hui puts up his  _  and says,"Ms Chen, you tell us that water has no color  _  no smell. But  _  can we find that kind of water? The  _  in the river behind my house is always black and it has bad smell. "Most of us  _  with him. "I am sorry, children," says Ms Chen. "Our water is getting  dirtier and dirtier  . That's a problem."
